title: This Underwear Stock Just Soared 30%. It Got a $5 Billion Bid, Says Report.
snippet: Hanesbrands stock rose while Gildan share fell after it was reported that the two companies are nearing a deal which would value Hanesbrands at about $5 billion.

title: Jyong Biotech's Plant‑Based Pipeline Targets Huge Markets But Risks Remain
snippet: Jyong Biotech targets urinary disorders with a novel botanical pipeline, but clinical and liquidity risks temper near-term upside. Read why MENS stock is a hold.
